page.title: 02CHURCH FENTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: { Kirk Fenton Parochial Primary School was erected in 1977. It's a small friendly school with 78 girls 49 boys.They come from the village,Local farms and RAF base. Age range is{4_11}years. The school day is 9:00am_3:30pm. Staff 1 male,5 female teachers. All teachers live outside the village. The school has a small swimming pool and 4 pets,a Guineapig,a Budgie and 2 Rabbits. The old school building is now used as a{village hall. } After school time the school is used for clubs eg Brownies,Guides and evening classes. The main problem at the school is the {low flying aeroplanes}they disturb the children and sometimes the teachers cannot be heard. {(KIRK means church.)
